PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05242021-06-10,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActOfficial Development Assistance Accountability Act
SubjectRegulations Defining "Official Development Assistance"
PrecisREGULATIONS DEFINING "OFFICIAL DEVELOPMENT ASSISTANCE" in order to define "official development assistance" for the purposes of the Official Development Assistance Accountability Act and to ensure that Canada's reporting under the Act is based on the most up-to-date internationally agreed definition of official development assistance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0128 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
